displaytitle: Homeland / (Message to C.A.M.) / Ledlewan / Old Stirlingshire / Scotland / Cow Roll Drawing, Number One
inscribed:
Inscribed in pencil on mount, recto below lower right corner of image: Thomas
Inscribed in pencil, recto lower right corner of mount:  A/P 1
Inscribed in ink, verso center:  homeland / (part one only of a two part work) / Ledlewan / Old Stirlingshire / Scotland, 1988 / © Thomas Joshua Cooper unique A//P 1 / (message to C. A. M.) / cow roll drawing, Number one / neg 1988 // print 1988
